root.name: Frank Thomas Big Hurt Baseball
root.description: Baseball player Frank Thomas licensed one of the first baseball games to use motion-captured 3D graphics and multiple camera angles. 28 stadiums have been rendered in 3D, and each has its own visible and significant differences. There are 6 distinct game modes, allowing for single exhibition matches as well as full seasons. There is also a Home Run Derby mode, allowing the player to pelt the ball out of the ground for points.

similar_games.game: Ken Griffey Jr Presents Major League Baseball
